item.title: EP 372 - My Teacher, The Demon Hunter
item.itunes:title: My Teacher, The Demon Hunter
item.description:
Today we listen to bagpipe music, try not to be eaten, and then we go back to school to meet an insane teacher!

 

Patreon 

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

 

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

 

Minecraft Server

deadrabbitradio171191.apexmc.co

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer 

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

 

Neighbors Fed Up With Bagpipes Blasting From McDonald’s On Broadway

https://sacramento.cbslocal.com/2020/01/03/bagpipes-blasting-broadway-mcdonalds/

 

Alabama woman who texted 'I feel in trouble' before she disappeared has been found dead, police say

https://www.cnn.com/2020/01/03/us/alabama-missing-woman-paighton-houston-dead/index.html

 

A Woman Left A Bar With Two Men, Then Texted Her Friend "I Feel In Trouble." Her Body Was Found Weeks Later.

https://www.buzzfeednews.com/article/skbaer/paighton-houston-missing-death-alabama

 

Accused cannibal eats part of Grindr date hanging from his ceiling, Michigan cops say

https://www.kansascity.com/news/nation-world/national/article238998043.html

Gruesome details revealed in death of Kevin Bacon

https://www.wilx.com/content/news/Police-describe-crime-scene-found-at-Latunskis-home--566745641.html

 

Hairstylist named Kevin Bacon killed, eaten by Grindr date from hell: cops

https://nypost.com/2020/01/07/hairstylist-named-kevin-bacon-killed-eaten-by-grindr-date-from-hell-cops/

 

Demons, a Bloody Ritual, and a Teacher in Florida

https://mysteriousuniverse.org/2019/12/demons-a-bloody-ritual-and-a-teacher-in-florida/

 

A Teacher Was Arrested For Leading Her Students In Cutting And Burning Ceremonies

https://www.ranker.com/list/danielle-harkins-student/jacob-shelton

 

Woman arrested on child abuse charges after bizarre cutting and burning ritual

https://www.tampabay.com/news/publicsafety/crime/woman-arrested-on-child-abuse-charges-after-bizarre-cutting-and-burning/1234986/

 

 

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black

 

"As Above" Art By Grant Scott

 

Dead Rabbit Skull By John from the SCAR Group

 

Halloween Monster By Finn

 

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Music By Dr. Huxxxtable

Rabbitron 3000 created by Eerbud

Thanks to Chris K, Founder Of The Golden Rabbit Brigade

 

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @DeadRabbitRadio

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

 

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

 

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2019
